title: Online Language Learning Project Through Purpose-Driven Interpersonal Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment centered on asynchronous interactions, with real-life language usage project implementation

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three types of purpose-driven interpersonal interaction (PII) - instructional, social, and supportive interaction - in actual projects
Learners can perform high-quality interactions at least twice weekly with peers and instructors using smartphone-based collaboration tools
Learners can quantitatively analyze the impact of interpersonal interaction on language proficiency improvement through project outcomes (language portfolios)

resources: Smartphone-compatible collaboration tools (KakaoWork, Google Docs mobile version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
